name: AMV Holding
overview: AMV Holding Limited, a mobile media and marketing company, along with its subsidiaries, develops and delivers mobile entertainment and content services in the United Kingdom. The company offers mobile content services, including chat, dating, and adult content, as well as operates games, video, photo, and music content. It also operates Free4U portal, which enables users to browse through content library. The companyâ€™s distribution channels include print media, mobile Internet, television, and direct marketing channels. It serves consumers and businesses in West and East European markets, Australia, South Africa, the United States, and Canada, as well as South Africa and Indonesia. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Marlow, the United Kingdom. As of October 23, 2008, AMV Holding Limited operates as a subsidiary of Mandalay Media, Inc.
